body: So I have had this annoying [1] next to the tab "My Discussions", but when I click on the tab, everything is read and there are no unread posts. I have had this problem for as long as I can remember, and I just wanted to ask if anyone had the same problem that I did, and also how to fix it. Thanks!
body_tagged: So I have had this annoying [1] next to the tab "My Discussions", but when I click on the tab, everything is read and there are no unread posts. I have had this problem for as long as I can remember, and I just wanted to ask if anyone had the same problem that I did, and also how to fix it. Thanks!
title: Quick question!

replies.body:
Click "Mark all read" and it will be removed


That [1] is an archived reply you didn't see

replies.body: Its a glitch, someone achieved a post on one of your discussions and now its stuck that way. Just hit the "Mark All Read" Button to fix it.
replies.body_tagged: Its a glitch, someone achieved a post on one of your discussions and now its stuck that way. Just hit the "Mark All Read" Button to fix it.
